member_organisations: None - RQA has individual members only.
fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Public Health
industry_forums:
1. RQA is involved with the EMA Inspectors Working Group with regard to producing a reflection paper on electronic source and electronic archiving in the clinical space. 
 
 
2. RQA attends the EMA CAR-T meetings as an industry expert. 
 
 
3. RQA is an active member of the EMA CTR Safety Reporting Subgroup.
eu_initiatives: Good Clinical Practices, Good Laboratory Practices, Good Research Practices, Quality Assurance (QA), Good Pharmacovigilance Practices, Medical Devices, Digital Systems, Data Integrity, Auditing, Inspections.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Delivery of training, publication of knowledge - magazines, website articles and booklets - running conferences, forums and seminars relating to Good Clinical Practices, Good Laboratory Practices, Good Research Practices, Quality Assurance (QA), Good Pharmacovigilance Practices, Medical Devices, Digital Systems, Data Integrity, Auditing, Inspections.
goals__remit:
Mission 
1.  To develop and promote quality standards in scientific research. 
2.  To facilitate knowledge sharing and transfer through: 
Discussion, Training, Seminars, Forums, Conferences, Publications, Partnership and co-operation. 
3.  To liaise with regulatory agencies in the development and interpretation of regulations and guidance.
